{{Description|This rose is beautiful, but beware its mortal thorns.}}
'''Lightning Rose''' is [[Lisa]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|energy frame|64}}
* Lightning Rose has a weak initial hit on cast to enemies within a certain radius, and then arcs another 29 times before disappearing. This initial hit, despite dealing {{Color|Electro DMG}}, does not apply any Electro.
** The initial hit's DMG value is 10% ATK and unaffected by talent level.<ref name=":0">KeqingMains Theorycrafting Library: [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/electro/lisa#lisas-initial-summon-dmg-numericalformula-data Lisa's Initial Summon DMG Numerical/Formula Data]</ref>
* {{Talent Note|snapshot|The damage of Lightning Rose|character=Lisa|talent=Lightning Rose|snapshottime=upon the placement of Lightning Rose}}

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Static Electricity Field|character=Lisa|talent=Lightning Rose}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|3|Resonant Thunder|character=Lisa|talent=Lightning Rose}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Plasma Eruption|Increases the number of simultaneous lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose to a maximum of 3.|character=Lisa|talent=Lightning Rose}}
